amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by EPA to hire any new employees under title 42 of the Public Health Service Act or to transfer current employees from the GS pay scale to title 42 status.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds by EPA to hire or pay the salary of any officer or employee of EPA under the Public Health Service Act who is not already receiving pay under that Act on the date of enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A102) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A102) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A102) offered by Mr. Burgess.
